name: Lawa BrightBars
overview:
LBPL was incorporated and started production of Bright steel bars in the year 1991. Today we are leading producers of CHQ Wires, Peeled bars and other value added products based in Pune. The company offers a wide range of products and services for demanding and critical applications in the automotive and industrial segment.

Vision: Our vision is to achieve leadership and maintain highest performance in our business and to partner our customers in their efforts to be leaders in their respective area.

Careers: We look for people who are motivated and share our passion for excellence. Here at LBPL there are endless opportunities to grow your skills and people are rewarded based on their performance. We require engineers, technical and also administrative talent.

Research And Development: Our infrastructural facility is divided into many sub-departments Research And Development is one of them well-equipped with the modern facilities ensures precise development of the products as per the emerging market trends.

Quality: We are committed to provide the highest quality services to our customers and maximize their cost savings through timely product and process improvements and strict adherence to QMS requirements. LBPL is also considerate for the safety and shall take all necessary measures to reduce the potential risk to its employees.
